long_description: the intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers. nisi is the biggest italian manufacturers of sofa bed frames, active in the market since 1972. we provide customized high quality solution combining comfort, design, and efficiency. we place constant attention to research and development that allow us to focus to customer needs, offering high standard and customized solution. solid roll-out system with an elegant design. revolving single bed for cruise ship cabins or kids' rooms. nisi takes care with passion and attention to all the production phases , up to after sales. we design and produce bespoke mattresses for sofa beds. we produce mattresses with fire resistance certifications compliant with hospitality and contract regulations.

generated_description: nisi group, legally known as nisi group srl., headquartered in forlì, emilia-romagna, is an italian manufacturer specializing in sofa bed frames and mattresses. established in 1972, the company is recognized as the largest italian manufacturer in this sector. nisi group focuses on providing customized, high-quality solutions that combine comfort, design, and efficiency. the company emphasizes reliability and promptness in its production process, supported by a highly automated system that reduces lead times compared to industry standards. nisi group places constant attention on research and development to meet customer needs and offers products with fire resistance certifications compliant with hospitality and contract regulations.
